AT.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown der Legenden
AT.description: Schließe dich Po, Tigress, Monkey, Tai Lung, Meister Shifu und all deinen Lieblingscharakteren aus Kung Fu Panda an und mische beim spannenden Showdown der Legenden mit. Es können sich bis zu vier Spieler gleichzeitig im Tal des Friedens und anderen kultigen Schauplätzen messen.

AU.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
AU.description: Join Po, Tigress, Monkey, Tai Lung, Master Shifu, and all of your favorite Kung Fu Panda characters as they compete in the thrilling Showdown of Legendary Legends. Up to four players can face-off in iconic locations throughout the Valley of Peace and beyond. Compete in an epic Tournament where all Kung Fu warriors contend for honor and glory.

BG.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
BG.description: Join Po, Tigress, Monkey, Tai Lung, Master Shifu, and all of your favorite Kung Fu Panda characters as they compete in the thrilling Showdown of Legendary Legends. Up to four players can face-off in iconic locations throughout the Valley of Peace and beyond. Compete in an epic Tournament where all Kung Fu warriors contend for honor and glory.

BE.name: Kung Fu Panda: Le Choc des Légendes
BE.description: Rejoignez Po, Tigresse, Singe, Taï Lung, maître Shifu et tous vos personnages préférés de kung-fu Panda dans un passionnant Choc des Légendes. Jusqu'à quatre joueurs s'affrontent dans des lieux emblématiques de la Vallée de la Paix et même au-delà. Participez à un tournoi homérique où tous les guerriers kung-fu luttent pour la gloire et l'honneur.

ES.name: Kung Fu Panda: Confrontación de leyendas legendarias
ES.description: Únete a Po, Tigresa, Mono, Tai Lung, el Maestro Shifu y todos tus personajes favoritos de Kung Fu Panda mientran compiten en la emocionante Confrontación de leyendas legendarias. Hasta cuatro jugadores pueden competir en lugares emblemáticos de todo el Valle de la Paz y más allá.

IT.name: Kung Fu Panda: scontro finale delle leggende leggendarie
IT.description: Unisciti a Po, Tigre, Scimmia, Tai Lung, Maestro Shifu e a tutti i tuoi personaggi preferiti di Kung Fu Panda, mentre si battono nell'emozionante scontro finale delle leggende leggendarie. Fino a quattro giocatori potranno affrontarsi in luoghi iconici nella Valle della Pace e oltre.

NL.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
NL.description: Sluit je aan bij Po, Tigress, Monkey, Tai Lung, Master Shifu en al je favoriete personages uit Kung Fu Panda en strijd mee in de Showdown of Legendary Legends. Tot vier spelers tegelijk vechten op allerlei herkenbare locatie in de Vallei van de Vrede en daarbuiten. Neem deel aan epische toernooien waarin Kung Fu-strijders vechten om eer en glorie.

NZ.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
NZ.description: Join Po, Tigress, Monkey, Tai Lung, Master Shifu, and all of your favorite Kung Fu Panda characters as they compete in the thrilling Showdown of Legendary Legends. PT.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
PT.description: Junta-te ao Po, Tigresa, Macaco, Tai Lung, Mestre Shifu e a todas as tuas personagens favoritas do Kung Fu Panda combatendo no empolgante Confronto das Lendas Lendárias. Até quatro jogadores podem competir em locais emblemáticos do Vale da Paz e mais além.

RU.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends
RU.description: Сражайтесь вместе с По, Мастером Тигрицей, Мастером Обезьяной, Тай Лунгом, Мастером Шифу и другими любимыми персонажами «Кунг-фу панды» в захватывающей игре «Кунг-фу панда: Столкновение легендарных легенд».
